metadata.name: The Kiss
metadata.description:
"The Kiss" is a modernized manga version and remake illustration based on the well known painting by Gustav Klimt.

This piece is focusing on intimacy, love and the strong bond between two humans. The couple is surrounded by gold and flowers while standing in the middle of a warm sunset. 

They dare to let go of everything around and just feeling each other. They are right there, right now in the beautiful moment of passion and lust. 

This piece embraces love and special connections we can feel towards others.
